price: Sema: Sijui kama yapo karibu hayo mnayo ahidiwa, au Mola wangu Mlezi atayawekea muda mrefu.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا
footnotes: Sema: Enyi makafiri! Sijui ni karibu hiyo adhabu mliyo ahidiwa, au Mola wangu Mlezi ataifanya iwe mbali?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul in adrī aqarībun mā tūʿadūna am yajʿalu lahu rabbī amadan
